name: WebSphere Query Template
summary: Learn about .XST files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: IBM WebSphere is a collection of Enterprise programs released in 1998 that enabled users to develop applications and integrate them with other programs. You will most likely only encounter WebSphere Query Template XST files if you are a developer creating Enterprise web applications hosted by WAS.

If you need to open a WebSphere Query Template XST file, you can use an XML editor since the files are stored in XML format. You can also create and edit WebSphere Query Template XST files with an XML editor, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Code, Microsoft XML Notepad, MacroMates TextMate, XMLBlueprint XML Editor, or SCREEM.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
